publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1528 Mr Jim Wallace: International Criminal Court Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of establishing the International Criminal Court in the legal systems of the United Kingdom and agrees that the provisions within the International Criminal Court Bill that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Iain Gray*

S1M-1528 Mr Jim Wallace: International Criminal Court Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of establishing the International Criminal Court in the legal systems of the United Kingdom and agrees that the provisions within the International Criminal Court Bill that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Iain Gray
